irp_kodis_2874.json.speaker: Speaker1

irp_kodis_2823.json.sentence: Submitted agreement: Buyer gets full refund, seller retracted their review, buyer retracted their review, seller did apologize, and buyer did apologize.

irp_kodis_2858.json.speaker: Speaker1
irp_kodis_2858.json.sentence: greetings Mam/Sir the tshirt arrived and it did not match the description on the website. May i please be refunded or sent the one that matches the description

irp_kodis_2858.json.speaker: Speaker2
irp_kodis_2858.json.sentence: Hello, mam/sir, I would like to inform you that the tshirt wasn't of a specified person on the website therefore I did not do anything wrong in this case. I spent money and resources to send over this item. I would like you to retract a bad review of me as I did nothing wrong

irp_kodis_2858.json.speaker: Speaker1
irp_kodis_2858.json.sentence: I will take down the review if you could please atleast give me a 90% refund. because it was false advertising on your website and i have taken pictures as proof. I do not want to end this on a bad note, as this tshirt is for my nephew and he would be disappointed because he is a Kobe fan

irp_kodis_2858.json.speaker: Speaker2
irp_kodis_2858.json.sentence: First of all, I have every right to complain to trade association about your illegal activities in trying to deceive me to get money and the tshirt. and you may get fined for lying and trying to deceive, as well as banned from this site altogether. I have proof that I sent a replica Los Angeles Lakers Basketball Championship jersey. It was not a Kobe shirt and it was never said that it was. You are only trying to get more money out of me, when it is quite shameless to do so

irp_kodis_2858.json.speaker: Speaker1
irp_kodis_2858.json.sentence: It is not an illegal activity and you know that. This can cause more problems for you because your website did not state that i was not going to get what i ordered. This is actually your store trying to lure customers in. Go ahead and complain i will do so too and you will not be able to sell on any website. I tried to huble myself but i can see that you do not want to resolve this issue properly. You forgetting that you stand a high chance of loosing your business than i do. Its either you apologise to me, give me my refund and i give you your shirt back, i take down the reviews and we part ways, because this will be bad for your business

irp_kodis_2858.json.speaker: Speaker2
irp_kodis_2858.json.sentence: Except the site never stated that it was a Kobe tshirt so you are in the wrong here. I will offer you a refund if you send over the shirt back, and you delete the bad review of me. Otherwise you won't get refunded and you will be stuck with the shirt. I only want to resolve this in a nice manner. I believe you should apologize to me as you didn't read description of shirt and wanted to get a shirt that was never even existing on our site. We don't sell Kobe shirts and never have

irp_kodis_2858.json.speaker: Speaker1
irp_kodis_2858.json.sentence: It is fine, I will send over the shirt and delete the bad review and you can refund me and apologise. I hope you will also apologise because if other customers see your comments they might not want to buy so let us keep a good reputation for your shop in terms of good responses. Thank you

irp_kodis_2858.json.speaker: Speaker2
irp_kodis_2858.json.sentence: We both must apologize because I do my business fairly and it is disheartening to see you shame me like this when I want what's best for customers. irp_kodis_2858.json.speaker: Speaker1
irp_kodis_2858.json.sentence: I will issue an apology no problem. Thank you so much enjoy the rest of your day

irp_kodis_2858.json.speaker: Speaker2
irp_kodis_2858.json.sentence: Submitted agreement: Buyer gets full refund, seller kept their review, buyer retracted their review, seller did apologize, and buyer did apologize
